Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 11 Ācayagāmittika » 11.1 Paṭiccavāra » 11.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 11.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Nahetu
Ācayagāmittika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Nahetu
8.
1443Ācayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ācayagāmī dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—  vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)
1444Nevācayagāmināpacayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—  ahetukaṃ nevācayagāmināpacayagāmiṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe…  khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā; ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ…pe…  bāhiraṃ…  āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ…  utusamuṭṭhānaṃ…  asaññasattānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ…pe… . (1)
<< 11.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāraup Naārammaṇa >>
